title: Dark Souls: Remastered *2018* [x64] [MULTI-ENG] [EXE] [STEAM]
description:
INFORMATION
-----------
==RePack==
Genre: Genre: RPG, Action, Adventure
Developer: QLOC
Publisher: Bandai Namco
Release Date: May 24, 2018
Languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Etc...
Crack: built-in (CODEX)


GAME INFORMATION
----------------
Then, there was fire. Re-experience the critically acclaimed, genre-defining game that started it all. Beautifully remastered, return to Lordran in stunning high-definition detail running at 60fps.
Dark Souls Remastered includes the main game plus the Artorias of the Abyss DLC.

Features:
• Deep and Dark Universe
• Each End is a New Beginning
• Gameplay Richness and Possibilities
• Sense of Learning, Mastering and Accomplishment
• The Way of the Multiplayer (up to 6 players with dedicated servers)


SYSTEM REQUIREMENT
------------------
• Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
• OS: Windows 7 SP1 64bit, Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit
• Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or Intel Core I7-4790K
• Memory: 8 GB RAM
• Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 290x or Nvidia GeForce GTX970
• DirectX: Version 11
• Storage: 8 GB available space
• Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device


INSTALLATION
------------
1. Download
2. Install "Dark.Souls.Remastered.exe" (if using Windows 10, run at Administrator privilege). Right-click context menu "Run as Administrator".
3. Play!
